alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, west central Hanover, northwestern Powhatan and Fluvanna Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Lake Monticello to near Goochland. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goochland, Hadensville, Palmyra, Cartersville, Fork Union, Lake Monticello, Columbia, Gum Spring, Oilville, Ferncliff, Kents Store, Troy, Fife, Montpelier, Duncan, Scottsville, Orchid, Maidens, Three Square and Central Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Powhatan; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
